title: Condominium in Town
posting_body: Nice 2 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom condo in The Courtyards on Madison Condominiums which is located in the heart of Bainbridge Island.
This beautiful unit is within walking distance to Seattle-Bainbridge Island ferry, shops, schools, bus line, etc.

This particular 868 square foot unit is townhouse style which includes a balcony off living room, open kitchen, unfortuantely fireplace in this unit does not nor can it work, washer/dryer, 2 car garage, freshly painted with newer carpet and more.
Please visit our website <URL> for more information and photos
